artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kyokutei Bakin; Publisher: Tōkyō Haishi Shuppansha

description: burnt-orange cover; pages of small print text; image near center of book of a battle scene in a garden; ghost above fight scene; another image in last quarter of book, distant view of temple complex and village rooftops in misty mountains; remaining pages of text
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From The Crescent Moon (Chinsetsu yumiharizuki 椿説弓張月)
title: The Crescent Moon, vol. 8
